meanings: (단단한 물체가) break, be[get] broken, fracture, (무게·압력 등으로) give way, (딱 소리를 내며) snap (off)

vlive.korean: 저는 똑부러지지도 않고 허당끼도 심해요, 뭐죠 그건? I'm not smart but clumsy. What's that? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [설아] 전지적 설아 시점👀💕
vlive.english: I'm not smart but clumsy. What's that?

vlive.korean: 이거 뽑으면서 부러지지 않겠지? Don't you think they would break? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [선데이 키즈] 빼빼로데이🖤
vlive.english: Don't you think they would break?

vlive.korean: 그러니까 부러지지. That's why you broke your arm. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [긍정이 체질] 5화
vlive.english: That's why you broke your arm.

vlive.korean: 여러분. - 손가락 부러지지는 마시고요. Guys! - But don't break your fingers. 듣기 View video CROSS GENE : 블랙마인드 선공개
vlive.english: Guys! - But don't break your fingers.

vlive.korean: 갈비뼈 부러지지 않게 안전 운전 하세요. Drive safely so that you don't break your rib. 듣기 View video Happy Robot Records : 지산 가는길!
vlive.english: Drive safely so that you don't break your rib.

examples.korean: One arrow alone can be easily broken but many arrows are indestructible. (Genghis Khan) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 화살 하나는 쉽게 부러져도 화살 한 묶음은 절대 부러지지 않는다. (칭기즈칸, 지혜명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: One arrow alone can be easily broken but many arrows are indestructible. (Genghis Khan) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Since he does his own stunts, Chan claims to have broken every single bone in his body; even his skull. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 성룡은 스턴트 연기를 스스로 하는 만큼 두개골을 포함해 몸에 부러지지 않은 뼈가 없다고 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: Since he does his own stunts, Chan claims to have broken every single bone in his body; even his skull. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Well, Mr. Flanders, your x-rays are normal, which means your ankle isn’t broken - it’s just a bad sprain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 플랜더스 씨, 선생님 엑스레이는 결과는 정상입니다, 발목이 부러지지 않았다는 뜻이죠. 심하게 삐었을 뿐입니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Well, Mr. Flanders, your x-rays are normal, which means your ankle isn’t broken - it’s just a bad sprain. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I was walking down the street, and some guy on a motorcycle came up behind me out of nowhere, and honked his horn! It scared me so bad I fell down and landed on my arm... I'm lucky it's only scratched, and not broken. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 길을 걷고 있는데 오토바이를 탄 남자가 갑자기 뒤에서 나타나더니 경적을 울리지 뭐야! 너무 놀라서 넘어졌는데 팔 위에 털썩 주저앉고 말았어… 그래도 긁히기만 하고 부러지지는 않았으니 운이 좋았어. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was walking down the street, and some guy on a motorcycle came up behind me out of nowhere, and honked his horn! It scared me so bad I fell down and landed on my arm... I'm lucky it's only scratched, and not broken. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You will break fewer pencil points. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 연필심이 거의 부러지지 않을 겁니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: You will break fewer pencil points. Add to Wordbook
